pageTitle: Deputies to forgo raises in 2008, cost-of-living increases fall victim to county budget crunch | ColumbineCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {20698=The budget crunch facing Jefferson County is filtering down to individual departments, and sheriff’s deputies will carry their share of the burden by forgoing cost-of-living raises in 2008., 26141=Columbine Courier | circulation@columbinecourier.com | 303-350-1030 5808 S Rapp St, Suite 119, Littleton, CO 80120 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 32609=Copyright © 2015}
